english.segment1: I will try to make ends meet. The best that I can, for you. You dont have to worry. All that I can ask is trust me
english.segment2: Give me what youve got. Dont hold back. Give it all away to grace
english.segment3: Everything about me was made for you. Everything inside me is all for you. Its deeper than we know right now. But weve got the time to figure out. Just how, everything about me was made for you
english.segment4: I will walk beside you. Even when the ground is shaking. I have been through the shadows. So I know that we will make it
english.segment5: Made for you . You, you, you. Was made for you. You, you, you
